price: 13. Mpe totiaki ye azala na mawa mpe bopeto, mpe azalaki moyengebeni,
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
